        public boolean updateCustomer(types.Customer cust)
        Updates a Customer and all Address-, Contact-, or Bancaccount data in the Database if data was chaged. The function also handles added or deleted Addresses, Contacts or Bankaccounts.
        Parameters:
        cust - - Instance of type Customer
        Returns:
        boolean for success or failure

      • updateLots

        public boolean updateLots(types.Order order)
        Updates Fields Priority, Volume, DueDate of all lots of a certain order. If Volume has been increased, new Lots will be inserted by consideration of Day Capacity.
        Returns:
        boolean for success or failure
        See Also:
        insertLotDayBalanced(types.Order, int)
